name: AgingChart
functionalRequirements:
## Aging Chart

### Purpose
Visualize accounts receivable aging buckets.

### Features
- Bar chart by age buckets
- 0-30, 31-60, 61-90, 90+ days
- Amount totals
- Color coding by severity
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- agingData: Array of bucket data

### Chart
- Plotly bar chart
- Color gradients
